question: Softening point should be __ the hottest day temperature
A steel ball is ____mm in diameter
The softening point is the temperatures at which the bitumen disks soften and

answers.a: Sag downwards to a distance of 30mm under the weight of a steel ball
answers.b: Sag downwards to a distance of 25mm under the weight of a steel ball
answers.c: Bulk upwards to a distance of 25mm under the weight of a steel ball
answers.d: Bulk upwards to a distance of 30mm under the weight of a steel ball

question: The maximum temperature recorded in Rajasthan in 2018 is 50.3°C, then the bitumen suitable for road construction in this region is
The following general statement may be made about the penetration value and softening point of bitumen

answers.a: For very high and very low penetration value the softening point is very low
answers.b: Absolutely no correlation can be drawn between penetration value and softening point of bitumen
answers.c: Higher the penetration value, higher is the softening point
answers.d: Higher the penetration value, lower is the softening point
